WorkItem.Description:
Hi all,

i don't know what is wrong with my Rules. This Package will install after succesfull installation again and again. First Screen is first rule, second the second rule and the third screen is from registry after succesfully installation. Can someone correct me?

Thanks and Regards
Winfried

Comments.Message: Sorry, XPhone44_1.png is the wrong one, i added now the correct one. XPhone44_1_Correct.png
Does Windows installed in 64 bit edition ?
No, this is a 32-Bit Windows 7 SP1.

OK, now its working. First Rule:

<bar:RegSzToVersion Key="HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE" Subkey="SOFTWARE\WSB\XPhone" Value="Version" Comparison="EqualTo" Data="4.4.0.0" RegType32="true"/>

Second Rule:
<bar:RegSzToVersion Key="HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE" Subkey="SOFTWARE\WSB\XPhone" Value="Version" Comparison="LessThan" Data="4.4.0.0" RegType32="true"/>

Thanks and Regards
Winfried
